name: Customers Without Any Sales Transactions
query:
SELECT
	`tabCustomer`.name as "Customer:Link/Customer:120",
	`tabCustomer`.customer_name as "Customer Name::120",
	`tabCustomer`.territory as "Territory:Link/Territory:120",
	`tabCustomer`.customer_group as "Customer Group:Link/Customer Group:120"
FROM
	`tabCustomer`
WHERE not exists(
		select name from `tabSales Invoice` 
		where `tabCustomer`.name = `tabSales Invoice`.customer 
		and `tabSales Invoice`.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
		and `tabSales Invoice`.docstatus=1 limit 1)
	and not exists(
		select name from `tabSales Order` 
		where `tabCustomer`.name = `tabSales Order`.customer 
		and `tabSales Order`.transaction_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
		and `tabSales Order`.docstatus=1 limit 1)
